.'' Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . `` In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wrote in a Feb. 9 email to employees. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways.
